name: Honey Lime Basil Peach Fruit Salad
description: Gorgeous honey lime basil peach fruit salad made with fresh peaches, berries, and pomegranate. Serve with your favorite summer mains!
ingredients: 4 large ripe (but not too ripe) yellow peaches, sliced
6 large basil leaves, cut into ribbons
instructions: Add peaches, blackberries, blueberries, pomegranate seeds, and basil leaves to a large bowl. Drizzle honey and lime juice, and toss with tongs. Serves 6.
